cobblemon.species.pumpkid.name: Pumpkid
cobblemon.species.pumpkid.desc: This Pokémon is known to care for the crops of farmers. It is commonly seen sunbathing.
cobblemon.species.gallagourd.name: Gallagourd
cobblemon.species.gallagourd.desc: This pokémon protects weaker Pokémon from their predators. If it is ever separated from its iron suit, it returns to being a Pumpkid.
cobblemon.species.nitkick.name: Nitkick
cobblemon.species.nitkick.desc: It is a powerful Pokémon, but its stubbornness against following orders makes it an unpopular choice.
cobblemon.species.anonkey.name: Anonkey
cobblemon.species.anonkey.desc: It destroys everything in its path. There is no reason, it is chaos incarnate. One kick could send even a snorlax flying.
cobblemon.species.bowne.name: Bowne
cobblemon.species.bowne.desc: It carries a handcrafted bow of bone at all times. This pokémon is never seen without it.
cobblemon.species.bognmarrow.name: Bognmarrow
cobblemon.species.bognmarrow.desc: It patrols its territory with a platoon of fellow Bognmarrow. Whichever one has the bigger mushroom is the leader... allegedly.
cobblemon.species.ivorice.name: Ivorice
cobblemon.species.ivorice.desc: While a solitary Pokémon, it sometimes hunts with Pokémon of similar cruelty, such as Weavile or Froslass.
cobblemon.species.withereign.name: Withereign
cobblemon.species.withereign.desc: This sinister Pokémon absorbs the souls of both its enemies and allies to fuel its power.
cobblemon.species.ocatalyst.name: Ocatalyst
cobblemon.species.ocatalyst.desc: It uses the alchemical flask on its tail to brew strange concoctions from berries. Its surpisingly sanitary.
